summary: Black and white ENB with red highlights.
descriptionHtml:
This ENB preset is focused on the atmosphere of grimdark and despair.

Installation:
1. Install ENB binaries (http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html)
2. Extract pallete.bmp, effect.txt and enbseries.ini to your Skyrim folder.
3. Start the game!
4. Enjoy!

Screenshots:
